page.title: 19Skipping Games.
page.content: { Mississippi. To play it,two people swing the rope and about three other people get in a line.The first person in the line jumps into the skipping rope.The other people sing,"Down Mississippi if you miss a loop you're out you're in."On "in" the next person jumps in.{ { Manfield Gardens. Two people swing the rope and the third jumps it while the others sing, "Manfield Gardens,what are you going to have?"Then you start spinning the rope and singing,"High,low,swing, garlic, pepper."If you land on high you have to jump bringing your knees up to your chest.Low is crouching down,swing is normal,garlic is round and round with your eyes closed,and pepper is just closing your eyes.If you don't do ten skips you are out.
